Text.Page: Back for more blood? {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} will tell you where to go and what to kill.

How do you like Val Aureum? Ready to hit the road and do my dirty work?

Awesome!

{@Rgn:18001#Colossal Ruins}, eh? So, they're like, big?

Guess who has your money? Yep, {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne}.

We need you to take down some {@LinkCreature:18#17$$ancient teraliths} in the {@Rgn:18001#Colossal Ruins} and bring back fragments of their big, funky, rock bodies.

That stuff is great for getting rid of calluses. 'Course, that's not all we use 'em for.

How was the trip to the {@Rgn:18001#Colossal Ruins}? Not a walk in the park, right?

Thanks. {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} will pay you for this job.

We need you to take down some {@LinkCreature:18#18#giant gladiators} in the {@Rgn:18001#Colossal Ruins} and bring me those fancy cuffs they wear on their enormous thumbs. They're made of a rare metal that's hard to find.

Great work!

Where will we send you next?
